item.title: Hiking's curated list of F-droid apps
item.description: Table of Contents Browsers File managers Images, Music and Videos Document Viewers EXIF / Metadata editors F-droid clients RSS clients E-mail clients Password Manager Social Media clients (Reddit, Facebook, etc) Keyboards Launchers & Icon Packs 2FA Games No category A curated list of some worth checking applications in the F-droid repo (and others too), short descriptions and notes are listed below. This list is low-maintainance mode, since the purpose of this list is to give you a taste of high-quality programs… I believe there is a problem in F-droid in how they index and promote content in the front page, making harder for the user to find anything useful for their needs.
